content:
@Grahame Grieve Something weird is happening with StructureMaps in the SDOH IG. In the source:
https://github.com/HL7/fhir-sdoh-clinicalcare/blob/master/input/resources/structuremap/SDOHCC-StructureMap-HungerVitalSignMapper-1.json
typeMode is present everywhere. However, in the published IG, typeMode has been stripped out:
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-sdoh-clinicalcare/StructureMap-SDOHCC-StructureMap-HungerVitalSignMapper-1.xml.html

That's problematic, given that typeMode is mandatory in R4. I presume it's a conversion error.
@Monique van Berkum @Robert Dieterle FYI
